name: Super Space Bros
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

1) I completed a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level. I added levels 3, 4, and 5.

2) I added multiple additional levels and tied them in to create a logical progression in my game. For example, in level 3 I added 1 basic tough walking enemy and 1 basic static enemy. In level 4 I kept everything from level 3, but added 1 green key pickup and 1 green door. In level 5 I kept everything from level 4, but added 1 extra life pickup and 1 basic static enemy. 

3) I modified the out of game menus in a few different ways. I changed the main menu UI backdrop color to yellow, I changed the colors of the main menu buttons, I changed the background planet color to green, and I renamed the game to "Super Space Bros".

These are all design modifications.

Credits:

Created by Grace Semaan
